column5: Hi all, Went to Lac Seul for the first time this year on Father's Day and the fishing was less than stellar by this lake's standards. The walleye were there but were not playing, and when we found some bass that did want to play my fishing partner that day was less than enthusiastic to play for anymore than 1/2 an hour, especially when I had to break it to him that the bass we were catching were too big to keep because of seasonal size restrictions. So back I went, this time with Roloff my chocolate Labrador, hoping the fish were in a better mood .https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bxmVoZ4E-eI
Limey your videos are the best keep em coming.How about a fall fisin show on lac seul? Thanks again
A stupendous video Simon. Some very nice sized walleye and a fishing partner who is always interested in what you're doing. Can't get better than that! Thanks for sharing.
I love how adding a dog to any video makes it at least 1000 times better!My Vizsla runs back and forth non stop all day so I don't get to fish with him when kids come with.
I have a Shih Tzu that's my BuddyHe wants to Drive, Let Him!!
